titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3867) to update and expand the procurement programs of the Small Business Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-407, by Mr. Cardoza.

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. No amendment to the bill shall be in order except those printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 140.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 773.
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H. Res. 773.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 216 - 180 (Roll no. 1013).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/30/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 3867 (Small Business Contracting Program Improvements Act).
